content:
# The attempt to insert wood into the Wooden Chest has failed again due to an incorrect target specification. The `insert_item` function requires an entity reference rather than a position.
#
# I need to retrieve the Wooden Chest entity first and then use that reference to insert the wood.

# Retrieving the Wooden Chest entity from the map.
wooden_chest_entity = get_entities({Prototype.WoodenChest}, position=Position(x=0.5, y=0.5))[0]  # Get the Wooden Chest entity.

# Now, I will attempt to insert wood into the Wooden Chest using the correct entity reference.
insert_item(Prototype.Wood, target=wooden_chest_entity, quantity=3)  # Inserting wood into the Wooden Chest.
